channel.title: Recovering an old hijacked account
channel.description: I have an old account i wanted to use, unfortunately it was hijacked a while ago and i was like "oh fuck it" back then, now im like "damn i wanna play on it" so luckily i think whoever hijacked it like 3 years ago :P never registered an email, so is there anyway to like recover an account if i dont have alot of info on it since the recoveries and everything has been changed?

item.title: Recovering an old hijacked account
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

I got my old account that was hacked 4+ years back by simply telling them what my ISP was at the time and a password it once had.
Also, this:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:9, topic:421413”]The recovery system for runescape is so full of shit.

You could literally write everything about your account and not get it back… or
you could literally write “I like trees, do you like trees?” and you will get your account back.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

The recovery system for runescape is so full of shit.

You could literally write everything about your account and not get it back… or

item.title: Recovering an old hijacked account
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

My friend’s account was hijacked about a month ago. He knows the earliest 3 passwords, recovery questions, e-mail and only year of creation but no month. Guess what, Jagex denied with a message like “Not enough information of ownership.” or something like that. The only thing he didn’t knew was subscription details and exact date of creation, only the year. And yes, the 3 passwords used before worked a few times as it kept getting hijacked but not this time.

Sorry but I doubt they will give you it back.

Read full topic

item.title: Recovering an old hijacked account
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Remembering the first password is 50% of the recovery as a whole.

Read full topic

item.title: Recovering an old hijacked account
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

i can remember the pass from like once i moved but my mem is blank from before then, whats the recovery chances if you dont remember the original password?

Read full topic

item.title: Recovering an old hijacked account
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Sounds like you are fucked. Being it was so far back, remember the exact month and year it was made, mem details if any, old passwords, and anything else that you need.

Read full topic
